title: 2020: Bernie Sanders on democratic socialism and Cardi B
description: Vermont Sen. Bernie Sanders sits down with Jon F. to talk about why he feels he's uniquely prepared to lead a movement for change in the 2020 presidential election, his Medicare for All plan, his strategy for getting an agenda through Congress and whether Cardi B will perform at his inauguration.
author: hey@crooked.com (Crooked Media)
